items.title: TCS leases 1.75 million sq ft for Rs 975 crore in Bengaluru’s Sattva Knowledge Point
items.description: TCS will pay a monthly rent of Rs 15.37 crore, translating to Rs 87.73 per sq ft. The company has paid a security deposit of Rs 25 crore.

items.title: MapmyIndia & Matrix Geo Solutions sign MoU for geospatial collaboration
items.description: Matrix Geo is a drone-based LiDAR mapping and digital engineering firm

items.title: Fresh Trump tariffs, what is at stake for Indian pharma, and the playbook to survive
items.description: Imported generics have so far managed to escape Trump’s glare likely due to their critical role in keeping US healthcare costs in check. However, Indian pharma is not waiting for the axe to fall, and experts say a multi-pronged defence strategy by key players is already in motion.

items.title: Air India raises $215 million from Standard Chartered, Bank of India
items.description: Air India News: The six-year loan, raised through Gujarat International Finance-Tec City, or GIFT City, is priced at about 168 basis points over the secured overnight financing rate, said the people, who asked not to be identified because it is not yet public

items.title: 'Battlefield' maker Electronic Arts inks $55 billion go-private deal with PIF, Silver Lake
items.description: The offer comes at a crucial time for Electronic Arts, which is gearing up to launch the much-awaited 'Battlefield 6' in an industry where gamers stick to proven and recognizable title

items.title: Mahindra & Mahindra to sell Sampo Rosenlew to TERA for over Rs 50 crore
items.description: Sampo has contributed meaningfully to M&M since it became part of the group.

items.title: UST, Kaynes Semicon to set up Rs 3,330 crore OSAT facility in Gujarat
items.description: The investment paves the way for deeper collaboration between UST and Kaynes Semicon in driving innovation across electronics, electric vehicles, renewables, and consumer technology,

items.title: Carlsberg commits to invest Rs 1,250 crore in food processing sector
items.description: Carlsberg  has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Ministry of Food Processing Industries (MoFPI), Government of India, at World Food India 2025

items.title: Tata Motor's JLR to return to manufacturing after cyber attack
items.description: Tata Motors News: The breach highlights the vulnerability of global businesses and government departments to increasingly sophisticated and more frequent cyber and ransom attacks

items.title: SpiceJet launches daily direct flights to Phuket from Delhi and Mumbai
items.description: Flights from Delhi to Phuket are set to commence on October 31, 2025, while services from Mumbai will begin on November 6, 2025

items.title: Pharma major GSK's CEO to step down after a nine-year term in surprise announcement amid Trump tariffs
items.description: The development comes at a time when US President Trump has announced fresh tariffs on global branded pharma majors, though GSK has said it plans to invest $30 billion in the United States over the next five years.

items.title: GIFT City emerging as global biz hub but yet to match traditional financial centres: PwC Survey
items.description: .The report highlighted that GIFT City, officially known as Gujarat International Finance Tec-City, demonstrates significant long-term growth potential

items.title: OPINION | IPO Journeys: No standard blueprint applies
items.description: It can be tempting to draw parallels and make comparisons between prominent companies, especially those under the same corporate umbrella. For example, while evaluating the IPO prospects of PhonePe (which has filed for a mega Rs 12,000 crore IPO), versus Flipkart, such direct comparisons can be misleading. These two entities, despite their shared Walmart parentage, operate on fundamentally different business models

items.title: Tata's Jaguar Land Rover seeks £2 bn to soften cyberattack blow: Report
items.description: The move comes amid a production halt at JLR’ facilities in UK, Slovakia, Brazil and India due to a cyberattack in late August

items.title: Bharat Electronics top Nifty gainer on Army's likely RFP for QRSAM system, or the Anant Shashtra air defence
items.description: It is expected that the tender has sought a formal invitation for proposal, also known as Request for Proposal (RFP) for 5-6 regiments of Anant Shastra (QRSAM) systems has been sought, which could result in an order for BEL if the Army accepts BEL's bid.

items.title: Heritage Foods: A compelling play on premium dairy items, GST reforms
items.description: Expanding VAP contribution and ice-cream capacity position HFL for operating leverage-led earnings acceleration

items.title: Kapiva raises $60 million from 360 ONE, Vertex Growth to boost R&D, brand push
items.description: The company plans to deploy the primary capital to strengthen research and development and manufacturing, step up brand building, and build out a health-tech ecosystem around its products
